duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide in-person support to residents with package questions/issues
Log recently-delivered packages into the property's automated package management system
Organize packages within the room to facilitate resident access
Identify aging/stale packages and prepare them for return to sender
Perform lightweight maintenance on the locker/package room management system
Perform room/system audits and in-person demonstrations for potential Liaison locations
Facilitate communication and transfer of prospective sales leads to the Market Development Representative
Build and nurture relationships with key decision-makers (property managers and property staff)
Maintain an excellent attendance record and consistently support a steady pipeline for the sales team
